subject: Basketball
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: The American basketball team led by just 12 at halftime against Australia, but it was not long before a first half filled with bad shot selection and stagnant offense was a distant memory.
snippet: The American basketball team led by just 12 at halftime against Australia, but it was not long before a first half filled with bad shot selection and stagnant offense was a distant memory.
